entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 1.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
